headline: Argus Research Raises Lam Research (LRCX) PT to $120 After Strong Q2 Performance
summary: Lam Research Corporation (NASDAQ:LRCX) is one of the most profitable growth stocks to buy according to billionaires. On August 1, Argus Research raised its price target on Lam Research to $120 from $105, while maintaining a Buy rating on the shares. The firm noted that Lam Research topped consensus estimates for adjusted EPS and revenue, […]

headline: Argus Raised the Firm’s PT on Lam Research Corporation (LRCX), Kept a Buy Rating
summary: Lam Research Corporation (NASDAQ:LRCX) is one of the Best Performing Quantum Computing Stocks So Far in 2025. On July 31, Argus raised the firm’s price target on Lam Research Corporation (NASDAQ:LRCX) from $105 to $120, while keeping a Buy rating on the stock. The improved bullish sentiment follows the company’s Q4 2025 report, where the company […]
